prompts: Create a pink Pokemon with a round shape and floral patterns on its body.
I want a whimsical creature that floats gracefully in the air, resembling a cloud.
Generate a psychic-type Pokemon that has a soft, dream-like appearance.
Make a small, cute creature with pastel colors and unique floral designs.
Imagine a Pokemon that embodies tranquility and has gentle, calming features.
Design a round, adorable Pokemon that is often found in grassy fields.
Show me a creature that has a lovely pink hue and is associated with dreams.
